string-array.name: welcome_activity_array
string-array.item: Is the party going to bomb? Real-time updates will tell you if the party is going to be worth it. Then just go for fun!
Unique advantages and benefits. No Fee Tickets, Points Program, Sweepstakes and more! Everything for you to have fun as you deserve.
Do not let anything pass! Organize your leisure schedule and do not miss any chance to have fun.
For those who seek the best of entertainment! Always find the best programs and places, based on your interests and habits.
